comment._content: Wow. This is just down the road from me. On a busy day of sport there are often kids climbing all over it......until last weekend. I see a rather unsightly fence has now been erected around it.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Now Trove is up and running again I've just read the Townsville Daily Bulletin item, which I'll add to my long list of newspaper items involving frontier conflict. Thanks for bringing this one to my attention. If anyone ever doubted the existence of a frontier war in 19th century Australia, then they can't have checked out the digitised newspapers.
